detail_desc: Set with a hoodie and pair of trousers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with ribbed sections. Hoodie with an extra-wide neckline, jersey-lined hood and a kangaroo pocket with a small fabric appliqué. Long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Metal ear cuffs in various designs decorated with rhinestones and pearly plastic beads. No piercing necessary as the cuffs clip onto the ear.
Sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Sweatshirt in a printed cotton blend with a round neckline, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short Tencel™ lyocell shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and short slits at the hems.
Jersey push-up bras with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, no fasteners.

All-in-one suit in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front and pockets in the side seams. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and long legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Biker jacket in soft imitation suede with a collar, decorative buttons on the lapels and a diagonal zip down the front. Long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs, zipped side pockets, a small flap pocket with a press-stud at the front and a decorative tab and button at the sides. Satin lining.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist and side stripes.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with elasticated lacing, an adjustable hook and loop tab at the top, appliqué on the tongue and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Platform trainers with a padded edge and tongue, and lacing at the front. Fabric linings and insoles. Platform front 3 cm, heel 5 cm.
5-pocket, high-waisted shorts in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details and sequined embroidery. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, and raw-edge hems.
Vest tops in ribbed cotton jersey.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with a sequined motif on the front. Long sleeves, short slits in the sides and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Ankle-length, high-waisted, jacquard-weave trousers in softly draping viscose with a sheen. Concealed zip and button at one side, side pockets and straight legs with creases front and back. Hems with glass-bead and sparkly-stone decorations and a short slit at the back.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in woven fabric with elastication around the top and short sleeves.
Fully lined swimsuit with a pattern on the front and deep neckline at the back.
Hipster briefs in jersey made from a cotton blend with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Body in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch.
Shirt in a crêpe weave with a bib front and cuffs in dobby-weave cotton. Small stand-up collar, concealed buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem.
Cropped top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a drawstring hood and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless top in satin with a layer of sequin-embroidered mesh over the front. Back in a viscose weave with buttons at the back of the neck.
Cardigan in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Metal hair clips with glittery decorations.

Cropped top in crinkled jersey that can be worn as an off-the-shoulder top with a square neckline and short puff sleeves. Narrow elastication and a small frill trim at the top and around the sleeves and hem.
Sleeveless blouse in airy chiffon with a grandad collar, gathered yoke at the back and buttons down the front. Seam at the hips and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Straight-cut T-shirt in sturdy organic cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Sleeveless body in ribbed viscose jersey with a deep V-neck front and back, a flatlock seam down the back and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Push-up bra in microfibre with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short-sleeved dress in soft, fine-knit cotton with an appliqué on the front.

Short parka in washed cotton twill with a stand-up collar and drawstring hood. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, side pockets with a press-stud, a drawstring at the waist and a press-stud at the cuffs. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Unlined.
Sunglasses with plastic frames with metal details and UV-protective tinted lenses.

Short dress in soft velvet made from a silk blend with a deep V-neck, looser fit at the top and fitted skirt. Wide, tapered sleeves with a covered button at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist, a concealed zip in one side and a gathered detail down the front of the skirt. Lined.

Shirt woven in a stretch cotton blend with a narrow turn-down collar, French front and a yoke and darts at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the physique. Narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves create a flattering silhouette.
Short, fitted dress in glossy jersey with a draped neckline, elastic spaghetti shoulder straps and a drawstring down each side that ties at the hem. Unlined.

Long-sleeved top in soft thermal fleece with a stand-up collar lined in woven fabric. Zip down the front, a zipped chest pocket in woven fabric, zipped front pockets, and taped trims at the cuffs and hem.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs.

Long dress with lace at the top and a skirt in a glossy weave. The lace bodice is half-lined and contains boning. Short cap sleeves and an opening with a button at the back of the neck and a concealed zip. Seam at the waist and gathered skirt. Lined.
Bikini briefs in lace and mesh with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Boxy top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip at the top. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Gilet in soft pile with a stand-up collar, zip down the front, front pockets and a ribbed hem.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Slim-fit jeans in different colours of superstretch denim. Adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and narrow hems.
Short dress in soft, fine-knit cashmere with a high, roll-edge collar, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a zip at the top, detachable shoulder strap and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 4x18x28.5 cm.
Shorts in soft, patterned jersey made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Short dress in softly draping viscose jersey with short, wide sleeves, a sewn-in wrapover at the front, seam with narrow elastication below the bust and ties at one side, and a flounce-trimmed skirt.
Wide, leopard-print kaftan in fleece with a hood and short sleeves.
Block-coloured swim shorts with elastication and ties at the waist, a fake fly and a small appliqué at the bottom of one leg. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Pre-tied bow ties in woven fabric with an elastic strap at the back of the neck with an adjustable plastic fastener. Width 8 cm.
Tops in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Wide dress in an airy weave made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with a V-neck and 3/4-length sleeves with a wide, flared flounce at the cuffs. Voluminous skirt with gathered tiers that have small frill trims. Underdress with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed denim with embroidered details. High waist, low crotch, button fly and straight legs.
Gently flared dress in a soft jacquard knit with ribbing around the neckline and cap sleeves.
Shopper in paper straw with two imitation leather handles, a zip at the top and two inner compartments. Lined. Size 12x41x54 cm.
Shorts in cotton twill with a drawstring at the waist, fake fly and side pockets.
Basic, long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey with narrow ribbing around the neckline.

Short, cold shoulder wrap dress in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and concealed press-stud at the top, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, short flounced sleeves and ties at the side. Flounce at the top that continues around the back, down the front and around the hem. Unlined.

Jacket in water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Flap front pockets with press-studs and elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Jacket in washed cotton denim with sewn-on sequins, a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets and buttoned cuffs.

Loose-fit, ankle-length jeans in washed cotton denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and adjustable tab with a button at each side. Pockets in the side seams and back pockets. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Joggers in cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and ribbed hems. Slim fit.
Shorts in woven fabric with decorative, shiny buttons at the front, a high waist and shaping darts at the back. Concealed zip in one side with a button at the top, and rounded hems.

Lightly padded jacket in woven fabric with a small, ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves, diagonal flap front pockets with a concealed press-stud, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined in taffeta made from recycled polyester.

Blouse in woven fabric with a high, frill-trimmed smocked collar and an opening with buttons at the back of the neck. V-shaped seam with a wide flounced trim at the front, and long sleeves with wide smocking at the cuffs. Unlined.
Sandals in imitation leather with square toes, narrow straps that can be wound and tied around the ankle, and covered block heels. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 4.5 cm.
Block-coloured T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a glittery text print on the front.
Long, three-strand necklace of thin metal chains in various designs, one with a coin-shaped pendant and another with a faceted plastic stone. Adjustable length 68-76 cm.

Pyjamas in soft jersey. Top with a wrapover front, short sleeves and gathers at the side for best fit over the tummy. Bottoms with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems. Can be worn both during pregnancy and while nursing afterwards. The cotton content of the pyjamas is organic.
Sleeveless, one-shoulder blouse in a cotton weave with a double flounce at the top and one shoulder with a narrow adjustable shoulder strap. Elasticated seam at the waist with a wide flared peplum.

Short dress in airy, patterned viscose crêpe with a V-neck, decorative buttons at the front and short sleeves with a tie detail. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Shorts in slub cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Trousers in soft, organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, discreet pockets in the side seams and elasticated hems. Soft brushed inside.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a ribbed shaft and elasticated tops.
Joggers in washed cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side and back pockets and elasticated hems. Loose fit.
Shaping. 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum, while keeping the jeans in shape. Regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.

Off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy viscose weave containing some linen with elastication and a narrow frill trim at the top. Decorative buttons down the front and long raglan sleeves with elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs.
Tube top in ribbed cotton jersey with elastication around the top.
